function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Systematic under-reporting of deaths leading to inaccurate seroprevalence estimates","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of disease transmission and risk, leading to inadequate public health response","Mitigation":"Implement robust death reporting and seroprevalence sampling methods, and use representative population samples","Technologies":"Advanced data collection and analysis methods, seroprevalence testing technologies","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Failure to consider the influence of other behaviors on disease transmission","Impact":"Inability to accurately identify and address factors contributing to transmission, leading to ineffective response strategies","Mitigation":"Incorporate analysis of external factors such as information environment and weather into transmission models","Technologies":"Advanced modeling software, data analytics tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Assumption of homogeneous mixing of people within each region","Impact":"Misrepresentation of transmission dynamics, leading to inaccurate modeling and intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Account for heterogeneous mixing patterns in transmission models, consider spatial and social factors","Technologies":"Spatial modeling software, social network analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
